item.title: Rust - std::convert::Into and std::convert::From
item.description: I’ve been spending time recently learning the Rust Programming Languageby writing a Riak Clientusing Riak’s Protocol Buffers API. Through Ownership& BorrowingRust enables safety that generally comes at the cost of flexibility. Through features like TraitsRust is able to give some flexibility back to the programmer. Some traits I’ve started to use recently include std::convert::Intoand std::convert::From. When the Into trait is applied to a type, it allows it to consume itself to convert to another type.
